translations: 大型衣橱（armoire 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: She coursed, coiffed and high-heeled, through rooms filled with marble coffee tables, gilt-framed armoires and fields of Persian carpets.
sentences.translation: 她裹着头巾，穿高跟鞋，在放满大理石茶几和镀金框的大衣橱、铺着波斯地毯的屋子里走来走去。

sentences.sentence: She coursed, coiffed and high-heeled, through rooms filled with marble coffee tables, gilt -framed armoires and fields of Persian carpets.
